dcterms:description: CARLA is a dynamic urban simulation environment used for training and evaluating automated driving systems, allowing for the generation of various driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:description: This dataset provides a comprehensive set of driving data for training end-to-end learning models for self-driving cars, utilizing real-world driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: End-to-End Learning for Self-Driving Cars

dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on teaching a driving agent to learn driving in a single day, providing a framework for rapid learning in autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: Learning to Drive in a Day
